TopicTitle: International construction ISS in Kerbal orbit.

Articles.Content:
What? Pics please, annotate them..

Basically, I cant dock to any docking port connected to node 2. I have every docking port in the game and from all the mods I have. the collider or something is blocking the docking port.

http://imgur.com/a/OAYva

Edited May 28, 2013 by ahd1601
You're not docking it bro. Mechjeb 2 hates the CBM's, time to learn manual docking as best as you can.
i tried manual, it didn't work either, what am i doing wrong?!?
Get Canadarm on the station strutted down to somethin them use that to berth.

You're not docking it bro. Mechjeb 2 hates the CBM's, time to learn manual docking as best as you can.

MJ2 never disappointed me with a CBM though.

If you want to legitimately assemble ISS, use mechjeb 2 for Russian Orbital Segment Assembly Ã­Â Â¼Ã­Â·Â·Ã­Â Â¼Ã­Â·Âº, that's how it is IRL, and use canadarm(Buran manipulator) or Canadarm2 for USOS Ã­Â Â¼Ã­Â·ÂºÃ­Â Â¼Ã­Â·Â¸
im not getting any magnetism at all when trying to dock, what is the problem?
also my debug menue is filled with null void exception or whatever
re download the pack and replace the CBM.

re download the pack and replace the CBM.

is that what is causing all the errors? what ever it is, has prevented all docking from happening. i cant dock anything
BUG REPORT!: The thousands of errors I was getting every second is being caused by the PMAs you might want to look into that...
We're aware, there's no docking object in PMA.
It will look cool, and its my fave part :3
They all need a statue, for different and amazing things that im to lazy to do. They're doing the most amazing job, and when its done I will scream.

It will look cool, and its my fave part :3

I've fixed it, sending it to Bobcat shortly.
Cool

We're aware, there's no docking object in PMA.

He may be referring to the log messages that generate when parts animate, no way around that as far as I know.

Basically, I cant dock to any docking port connected to node 2. I have every docking port in the game and from all the mods I have. the collider or something is blocking the docking port.

http://imgur.com/a/OAYva

Ah, for the dragon go into part or wherever it is, go to KerbXDragonDockingport, open the notepad thing and go to the second {MODUAL} and change port size to 5.

No don't change it, you can do what I did:

CBM and kerbx port connected. thought its CBM to CBM but there's a kerbx on that other CBM, then you can easily dock dragon, Cygnus, etc.
Ok, the new station I put in orbit In the same orbit as the real ISS...

Thanks for this amazing pack!

But I noticed that the lengths of Unity Node 1 and Node 2/3 are backwards.

Unity Node 1 is 5.47 meters long - http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/structure/elements/node1.html

Node 2/3 is 7.19 meters long - http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/structure/elements/node2.html

I don't know how hard it would be to fix this, but I thought you all should at least be aware of this.

The main problem I encounter at this time is with the PMA. If I activate the docking camera on a port, then select the PMA as a target, the docking camera disappears. Is this due to the lack of a docking object as mentioned before?

Thanks for this amazing pack!

But I noticed that the lengths of Unity Node 1 and Node 2/3 are backwards.

Unity Node 1 is 5.47 meters long - http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/structure/elements/node1.html

Node 2/3 is 7.19 meters long - http://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/station/structure/elements/node2.html

I don't know how hard it would be to fix this, but I thought you all should at least be aware of this.

Kerbals are scaled to 0.64 roughly of humans, therefore everything else is too, got as close as I could without making it look squishy.

Once I got the PMA issue out of the way, I was able to dock with the ISS and this mod is really great. Just one question, why is the CBM nodeType = size5? Is this for things to come, or will it be changed?

why is the CBM nodeType = size5?

Because IRL CBM can dock only other CBM.
